Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 24th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2016...
Traded from Atlanta to Brooklyn on 5/11/2016 (Going to BRO: 2B Steven Mora. Going to ATL: LF Guille Meraz)...
Injured on 8/12/2019 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Traded from Brooklyn to Cincinnati on 2/1/2020 (Going to BRO: 1B Pedro Sol, P Maels Tomas, P Randall Joseph. Going to CIN: LF Andre Winston, 2B Steven Mora, P Richard Thomas, P Zachary Pietrzak).
..
Injured on 4/10/2020 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/21/2020, off Dion Granados (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/28/2020, off Richard Maddocks (ATL)...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2020...
Traded from Cincinnati to Houston on 5/11/2022 (Going to HOU: P John Henriques, 2B Steven Mora, 3B Edward Washington, P Richard Maddocks, P Tony Amaral. Going to CIN: CF Craig Parkhill)...
Was claimed off waivers by Seattle on 6/16/2022.
Released by Seattle on 6/26/2022...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 7/10/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $616,000 per year...
